remarks: The law of concretion for a binary relation.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
opelopabg.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opelopabg.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
brabg.5 $e |- R = { <. x , y >. | ph } $.
brabg $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( A R B <-> ch ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ch x y $.
